Package it.unimol.player_manager.app

Class PlayersManager

java.lang.Object
it.unimol.player_manager.app.PlayersManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class PlayersManager extends Object implements Serializable
Singleton class that manages a collection of Player objects. Provides methods to add, remove, and retrieve players by their jersey number. Ensures that each player has a unique jersey number and persists changes to a PostgreSQL database using PostgreConnection.

This class is serializable and maintains an internal mapping of player IDs to Player instances.

Version:
1.0
Author:
leliopalmix
